title: Louis Vuitton
description: Louis Vuitton is renowned for its signature brand colors - a sophisticated earthy brown (#3D302D) paired with an elegant gold (#92784E). These hues symbolize luxury and are prominently featured across their designs and promotional materials. The specified brand colors and further details can be explored through resources such as the official Louis Vuitton website and the specific Behance project showcasing the brand's style guide.
